primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The expansion of the 'miracle of abundance' from a restricted zone of privilege (Jews/Galilee) to a zone of disadvantage (Greeks/Decapolis) through the conversion and reeducation of the Messiah.

tekstueel_bewijs: He took, he blessed, he broke, he gave.
He exhibits his conversion by promptly going to the Decapolis.
the power of holiness that he embodied
the redistribution of bread and all manner of good things

zender.identificatie: The Syrophoenician Woman (as the source of the new value system)
tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus had to be instructed about the power of God for those who are not my kind
This bold defiant mother... insists on healing beyond the narrow sphere of privilege.
The future of West Louisville will be as a recipient of abundance
Greeks... are the target of the compassion of Jesus.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer is invited to identify with the 'insistent woman' (Sender) or the 'converted leadership' (Subject).

helper.identificatie: Martin Luther King Jr. / Gospel Voice
tekstueel_bewijs: Martin would join us in the redistribution of bread
helper.rol_van_god: God is the ultimate source of the surplus, but is largely passive until the human Subject acts.
helper.rol_van_geest: Absent; replaced by the 'Gospel voice' of social justice.

tegenstander.identificatie: Purity Laws / Racial-Ethnic Bias / Opinion Makers
tekstueel_bewijs: purity laws are articulated by the managers of the goodies
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is a social construct and a psychological bias (prejudice) rather than a cosmic force like Sin or Death.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The contemporary application: The church/city moving from privilege to disadvantage in Louisville.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The 'Leadership of Privilege' / The Hearers
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Redistribution of resources to West Louisville
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The biblical narrative is used as a direct template for the social-political action required today.

voorbeelden_god_subject: God is the giver of many baskets of well-being.
the wonder of God cannot be monopolized.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Jesus had to grow and give up old socio-religious conviction.
We insist until we get a reassuring answer.

voorbeelden: It is time to move the festival of abundance.
she will not let old racist distinctions determine...
Jesus is able and ready to make this geographical move.
He had not thought beyond his own Jewishness.
The power of Jesus is at work.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The theology is one of 'Enlightenment' and 'Will'. The primary problem is a lack of knowledge (bias) and the solution is reeducation leading to a new will to act.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Purity/Exclusion) through ~S2 (Crumbs for dogs) to S1 (Abundance for all).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is achieved through the 'conversion' of the Subject (Jesus) by the Sender (the woman).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: S2 is treated as a social/ideological error rather than a spiritual state of death.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While using the figure of Jesus, the sermon is anthropocentric. Jesus is the Subject who must 'grow' and 'learn,' making him an exemplar for human leaders. The 'Gospel' is redefined as social redistribution.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus had to grow and give up old socio-religious conviction.
The future of West Louisville will be as a recipient of abundance.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: God is the giver of many baskets of well-being.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Jesus is modeled as a leader who overcomes bias; the woman is modeled as a social activist.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: A theocentric reading would see Jesus as the Sender who intentionally tests the woman to reveal the Father's pre-ordained plan for the Gentiles, rather than Jesus being 'converted' by her.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Salvation is horizontal (social equity) rather than vertical (reconciliation with God).

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Extremely coherent as a social-political manifesto using narrative geography.
spanning_punten: The tension between Jesus as 'Lord of abundance' and Jesus as a 'student of a nobody'.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Jesus exhibits his conversion... Martin would expect us to interrupt settled geography.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: Competence comes from 'instruction' and 'reeducation' (Savoir) rather than the Spirit's power (Pouvoir).

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is identified as 'racial-ethnic bias' and 'comfort zones'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon functions as a 'Call to Action' where the hearer is the Subject. Jesus is demoted from the 'Sender' of Grace to a 'Subject' who needs to be corrected by human wisdom.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: Jesus is the one being changed, not the one changing us.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: Position Jesus as the one who *brings* the abundance to the Gentiles because of the Father's will, not because he was 'caught' in a mistake.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'Jesus had to be reeducated,' use 'Jesus reveals through this woman that God's heart was always beating for the Decapolis.'

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: Hearer as the 're-educator' of the Messiah.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Focus on the hearer as the 'hungry Greek' who has no right to the bread but receives it by Christ's sovereign mercy.

modale_balans.huidige_onbalans: Heavy on Savoir (Knowing better) and Devoir (Must redistribute).
modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Increase Pouvoir (The Spirit's power to change hearts).
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Address how we *cannot* break our own biases without a miracle of the Spirit.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Identify the 'unclean spirit' in the text as a real power that only Christ can cast out.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: If the opponent is just a 'bias,' we don't need a Savior, just a seminar.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.probleem: The secondary program (social ethics) has swallowed the primary program (soteriology).
narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: 1. Christ saves the unworthy (Grace). 2. Therefore, we seek justice for the neighbor (Ethics).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is rhetorically brilliant and socially urgent, but structurally moralistic. It risks turning the Gospel into a 'Geography Lesson' where the human will is the primary engine of change.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, this is a masterpiece of 'prophetic' speech. Actantially, it is a 'law' sermon because the Subject is human effort.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would note that Jesus' 'dog' comment is likely a pedagogical trial; Greimassian analysis shows that making Jesus a 'learner' changes the entire theological engine.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that the 'Syrophoenician Woman' has actually taken the place of God (Sender) in this sermon's structure.

appendices.notities: The sermon uses 'Eucharistic' language (took, blessed, broke, gave) but applies it to social-economic redistribution rather than the forgiveness of sins.
